title: New version available
message: An update for Icerrr is availabe. Download now?

title: About that changelog
message: If you've just updated Icerrr and are curious as to what's new, you can now go to Menu > About. There you can find a link to the full changelog.
This also means I won't bug you with annoying messages after an update anymore! The joy!

title: Update installed!
message: Icerrr has recently been updated to the latest version.
Do you want to see what's new?

title: Notice
message:
Unfortunately Icerrr has been pulled from the Google Play Store. Again.

You may continue to use the app but I can not push any updates as long as this situation has not been resolved.

I apoligize for the inconvenience and hope to offer a solution soon.
